verbose_text: As there is evidence of OA in very old BS2 guinea pigs, it could be speculated that those elements modified in the " later onset " BS2 as well as the DH represent the earliest stages of OA pathology, such that denatured type II collagen, collagen hydroxylation (in cartilage and bone), MMP-9 (also in both) and Ca :P, are early events, whereas changes in GAG content, collagen crosslinking, MMP-2 and ALP are part of established disease in th DH animals.
